Package com.example.project4

Class PizzaOrderController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.PizzaOrderController
public class PizzaOrderController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling all events occurring in PizzaOrderView.
Author:
Aayush Jha, Tarik Mahmutbegovic

    • addTopping

      public void addTopping(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler for Add button. Attempts to add the selected topping to pizza, alerts the user if not possible to add the selected topping.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • removeTopping

      public void removeTopping(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler for Remove button. Attempts to remove the selected topping from the pizza, alerts user if they are removing an essential topping from the pizza.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • addToOrder

      public void addToOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler for Add Order button. Adds the pizza to the current order of the user.

      event -
